panels.description: Last processed for a specified time period
panels.title: Epoch

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
  current.val_balance - previous.val_balance AS GWei,
  current.val_id as Validator
FROM 
  (
    SELECT val_balance, val_id, val_nos_id 
    FROM stats.validators_summary 
    WHERE 
      val_status != 'pending_queued' AND 
      val_nos_name = '${nos_name_var}' AND
      epoch = ${epoch_number_var}
  ) AS current
LEFT JOIN
  (
    SELECT val_balance, val_id, val_nos_id 
    FROM stats.validators_summary 
    WHERE 
      val_status != 'pending_queued' AND 
      val_nos_name = '${nos_name_var}' AND
      epoch = ${epoch_number_var} - 6
  ) AS previous
ON
  previous.val_nos_id = current.val_nos_id AND 
  previous.val_id = current.val_id
HAVING (current.val_balance - previous.val_balance) < 0
ORDER BY GWei ASC
LIMIT ${limit}
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
  current.val_balance - previous.val_balance AS GWei,
  current.val_id as Validator
FROM 
  (
    SELECT val_balance, val_id, val_nos_id 
    FROM stats.validators_summary 
    WHERE 
      val_status != 'pending_queued' AND 
      val_nos_name = 'Figment' AND
      epoch = 157285
  ) AS current
LEFT JOIN
  (
    SELECT val_balance, val_id, val_nos_id 
    FROM stats.validators_summary 
    WHERE 
      val_status != 'pending_queued' AND 
      val_nos_name = 'Figment' AND
      epoch = 157285 - 6
  ) AS previous
ON
  previous.val_nos_id = current.val_nos_id AND 
  previous.val_id = current.val_id
HAVING (current.val_balance - previous.val_balance) < 0
ORDER BY GWei ASC
LIMIT 100

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
  block_to_propose as Block,
  val_id as Validator
FROM stats.validators_summary
WHERE is_proposer = 1 AND block_proposed = 0 AND (epoch = ${epoch_number_var}) AND val_nos_name = '${nos_name_var}'
ORDER BY block_to_propose DESC, val_id
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
  block_to_propose as Block,
  val_id as Validator
FROM stats.validators_summary
WHERE is_proposer = 1 AND block_proposed = 0 AND (epoch = 157286) AND val_nos_name = 'Allnodes'
ORDER BY block_to_propose DESC, val_id

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
  val_id as Validator
FROM (
  SELECT
    val_id,
    count() AS count_fail
  FROM
    stats.validators_summary
  WHERE
    is_sync = 1 AND sync_percent < (${chain_sync_avg_participation} - ${sync_participation_distance_var}) AND
    (epoch <= ${epoch_number_var} AND epoch > (${epoch_number_var} - ${sync_epochs_var})) AND
    val_nos_name = '${nos_name_var}'
  GROUP BY val_id
)
WHERE count_fail = ${sync_epochs_var}
ORDER BY count_fail DESC, val_id
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
  val_id as Validator
FROM (
  SELECT
    val_id,
    count() AS count_fail
  FROM
    stats.validators_summary
  WHERE
    is_sync = 1 AND sync_percent < (97.393798828125 - 0) AND
    (epoch <= 157286 AND epoch > (157286 - 3)) AND
    val_nos_name = 'Figment'
  GROUP BY val_id
)
WHERE count_fail = 3
ORDER BY count_fail DESC, val_id

panels.title: Bad Sync participation (${sync_epochs_var} epochs in a row)

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
  val_id as Validators
FROM (
    SELECT
      val_id,
      count() as count_fail
    FROM stats.validators_summary
    WHERE att_happened = 0 AND 
    (epoch <= ${epoch_number_var} AND epoch > (${epoch_number_var} - ${att_epochs_var})) AND
    val_nos_name = '${nos_name_var}'
    GROUP BY val_id
)
WHERE count_fail = ${att_epochs_var}
ORDER BY count_fail DESC, val_id
LIMIT ${limit}
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
  val_id as Validators
FROM (
    SELECT
      val_id,
      count() as count_fail
    FROM stats.validators_summary
    WHERE att_happened = 0 AND 
    (epoch <= 157475 AND epoch > (157475 - 3)) AND
    val_nos_name = 'Allnodes'
    GROUP BY val_id
)
WHERE count_fail = 3
ORDER BY count_fail DESC, val_id
LIMIT 100

panels.title: Missed attestation (${att_epochs_var} epochs in a row)

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
  val_id as Validator,
  count() as count_fail
FROM stats.validators_summary
WHERE
  val_nos_name = '${nos_name_var}' AND
  att_happened = 1 AND
  att_inc_delay > 1 AND
  (epoch <= ${epoch_number_var} AND epoch > (${epoch_number_var} - ${att_epochs_var}))
GROUP BY val_id, val_nos_name
HAVING count_fail = ${att_epochs_var}
ORDER BY count_fail DESC, val_id
LIMIT ${limit}
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
  val_id as Validator,
  count() as count_fail
FROM stats.validators_summary
WHERE
  val_nos_name = 'Allnodes' AND
  att_happened = 1 AND
  att_inc_delay > 1 AND
  (epoch <= 157476 AND epoch > (157476 - 3))
GROUP BY val_id, val_nos_name
HAVING count_fail = 3
ORDER BY count_fail DESC, val_id
LIMIT 100

panels.title: High inclusion delay (${att_epochs_var} epochs in a row)

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
  val_id as Validator,
  count() as count_fail
FROM stats.validators_summary
WHERE
  val_nos_name = '${nos_name_var}' AND
  (att_valid_head + att_valid_target + att_valid_source = 1) AND
  (epoch <= ${epoch_number_var} AND epoch > (${epoch_number_var} - ${att_epochs_var}))
GROUP BY val_id, val_nos_name
HAVING count_fail = ${att_epochs_var}
ORDER BY count_fail DESC, val_id
LIMIT ${limit}
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
  val_id as Validator,
  count() as count_fail
FROM stats.validators_summary
WHERE
  val_nos_name = 'Allnodes' AND
  (att_valid_head + att_valid_target + att_valid_source = 1) AND
  (epoch <=  AND epoch > ( - 3))
GROUP BY val_id, val_nos_name
HAVING count_fail = 3
ORDER BY count_fail DESC, val_id
LIMIT 100

panels.title: Invalid attestation properties (${att_epochs_var} epochs in a row)

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    val_status as Status,
    val_id as Validator
FROM stats.validators_summary
WHERE (val_status == 'active_slashed' OR val_status == 'exited_slashed' OR val_slashed == 1) and val_nos_name = 'Allnodes' and epoch = 157288
LIMIT 100

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
  current.val_balance - previous.val_balance AS GWei,
  current.val_id as Validator
FROM 
  (
    SELECT val_balance, val_id, val_nos_id 
    FROM stats.validators_summary 
    WHERE 
      val_status != 'pending_queued' AND 
      val_nos_id IS NOT NULL AND
      epoch = ${epoch_number_var}
  ) AS current
LEFT JOIN
  (
    SELECT val_balance, val_id, val_nos_id 
    FROM stats.validators_summary 
    WHERE 
      val_status != 'pending_queued' AND 
      val_nos_id IS NOT NULL AND
      epoch = ${epoch_number_var} - 6
  ) AS previous
ON
  previous.val_nos_id = current.val_nos_id AND 
  previous.val_id = current.val_id
ORDER BY GWei ASC
LIMIT 100
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
  current.val_balance - previous.val_balance AS GWei,
  current.val_id as Validator
FROM 
  (
    SELECT val_balance, val_id, val_nos_id 
    FROM stats.validators_summary 
    WHERE 
      val_status != 'pending_queued' AND 
      val_nos_id IS NOT NULL AND
      epoch = 157261
  ) AS current
LEFT JOIN
  (
    SELECT val_balance, val_id, val_nos_id 
    FROM stats.validators_summary 
    WHERE 
      val_status != 'pending_queued' AND 
      val_nos_id IS NOT NULL AND
      epoch = 157261 - 6
  ) AS previous
ON
  previous.val_nos_id = current.val_nos_id AND 
  previous.val_id = current.val_id
ORDER BY GWei ASC
LIMIT 100

panels.title: Number of validators with negative delta

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
  block_to_propose as Block,
  val_id as Validator
FROM stats.validators_summary
WHERE is_proposer = 1 AND val_nos_name = '${nos_name_var}' AND block_proposed = 0 AND (epoch <= ${epoch_number_var} AND epoch > (${epoch_number_var} - ${epochs_range}))
ORDER BY block_to_propose DESC, val_id
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
  block_to_propose as Block,
  val_id as Validator
FROM stats.validators_summary
WHERE is_proposer = 1 AND val_nos_name = 'RockLogic GmbH' AND block_proposed = 0 AND (epoch <= 160698 AND epoch > (160698 - 40))
ORDER BY block_to_propose DESC, val_id

panels.title: Number of validators with missed proposals

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    sync_percent as Percent,
    val_id as Validator
FROM
    stats.validators_summary
WHERE is_sync = 1 AND val_nos_name = '${nos_name_var}' AND epoch = ${epoch_number_var} AND sync_percent < (${chain_sync_avg_participation} - ${sync_participation_distance_var})
ORDER BY sync_percent
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    sync_percent as Percent,
    val_id as Validator
FROM
    stats.validators_summary
WHERE is_sync = 1 AND val_nos_name = 'ChainLayer' AND epoch = 157270 AND sync_percent < (93.756103515625 - 0)
ORDER BY sync_percent

panels.title: Number of validators with sync participation less average

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
      count() as Fails,
      val_id as Validator
    FROM stats.validators_summary
    WHERE att_happened = 0 AND val_nos_name = '${nos_name_var}' AND
    (epoch <= ${epoch_number_var} AND epoch > (${epoch_number_var} - ${epochs_range}))
    GROUP BY val_id
    ORDER BY Fails DESC, val_id
    LIMIT ${limit}
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
      count() as Fails,
      val_id as Validator
    FROM stats.validators_summary
    WHERE att_happened = 0 AND val_nos_name = 'RockLogic GmbH' AND
    (epoch <= 160699 AND epoch > (160699 - 39))
    GROUP BY val_id
    ORDER BY Fails DESC, val_id
    LIMIT 100

panels.title: Number of MISSED attestations (${epochs_range} epochs range)
Number of validators with MISSED attestation

    WHERE att_happened = 1 AND att_inc_delay > 1 AND val_nos_name = '${nos_name_var}' AND
    (epoch <= ${epoch_number_var} AND epoch > (${epoch_number_var} - ${epochs_range}))
